verses.verse: The sin <WH2403> of Judah <WH3063> is written <WH3789> with a pen <WH5842> of iron, <WH1270> and with the point <WH6856> of a diamond: <WH8068> it is engraved <WH2790> on the tablet <WH3871> of their heart, <WH3820> and on the horns <WH7161> of your altars; <WH4196>

For he shall be as a tree <WH6086> planted <WH8362> by the waters, <WH4325> who spreads out <WH7971> its roots <WH8328> by the river, <WH3105> and shall not fear <WH7200> when heat <WH2527> comes, <WH935> but its leaf <WH5929> shall be green; <WH7488> and shall not be careful <WH1672> in the year <WH8141> of drought, <WH1226> neither shall cease <WH4185> from yielding <WH6213> fruit. <WH6529>
The heart <WH3820> is deceitful <WH6121> above all things, <WH605> and it is exceedingly corrupt: who can know it? <WH3045>

As the partridge <WH7124> that sits <WH1716> on eggs which she has not laid, <WH3205> so is he who gets <WH6213> riches, <WH6239> and not by right; <WH4941> in the midst <WH2677> of his days <WH3117> they shall leave <WH5800> him, <WH319> and at his end he shall be a fool. <WH5036>

Yahweh, <WH3068> the hope <WH4723> of Israel, <WH3478> all who forsake <WH5800> you shall be disappointed. <WH954> Those who depart <WH3249> from me <WH5493> shall be written <WH3789> in the earth, <WH776> because they have forsaken <WH5800> Yahweh, <WH3068> the spring <WH4726> of living <WH2416> waters. <WH4325>
Heal <WH7495> me, <WH3068> O Yahweh, and I shall be healed; <WH7495> save <WH3467> me, <WH3467> and I shall be saved: for you are my praise. <WH8416>

As for me, <WH213> I have not hurried from being a shepherd <WH7462> after <WH310> you; <WH183> neither have I desired the woeful <WH605> day; <WH3117> you know: <WH3045> that which came out <WH4161> of my lips <WH8193> was before <WH5227> your face. <WH6440>

Let them be disappointed <WH954> who persecute <WH7291> me, <WH954> but let not me be disappointed; let them be dismayed, <WH2865> but don't <WH2865> let me be dismayed; bring <WH935> on them the day <WH3117> of evil, <WH7451> and destroy <WH7665> them with double <WH4932> destruction. <WH7670>

Thus said <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> to me: <WH1980> Go, and stand <WH5975> in the gate <WH8179> of the children <WH1121> of the people, <WH5971> through which the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> come in, <WH935> and by which they go out, <WH3318> and in all the gates <WH8179> of Jerusalem; <WH3389>

and tell <WH559> them, <WH8085> Hear the word <WH1697> of Yahweh, <WH3068> you kings <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> and all Judah, <WH3063> and all the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> that enter in <WH935> by these gates: <WH8179>

But they didn't <WH241> listen, neither turn <WH5186> their ear, <WH241> but made their neck <WH6203> stiff, <WH7185> that they might not hear, <WH8085> and might not receive <WH3947> instruction. <WH4148>

It shall happen, <WH8085> if you diligently listen <WH8085> to me, <WH5002> says Yahweh, <WH3068> to bring <WH935> in no burden <WH4853> through the gates <WH8179> of this city <WH5892> on the Sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> but to make the Sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> holy, <WH6942> to do <WH6213> no <WH1115> work therein; <WH4399>

then shall there enter <WH935> in by the gates <WH8179> of this city <WH5892> kings <WH4428> and princes <WH8269> sitting <WH3427> on the throne <WH3678> of David, <WH1732> riding <WH7392> in chariots <WH7393> and on horses, <WH5483> they, <WH8269> and their princes, the men <WH376> of Judah, <WH3063> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem; <WH3389> and this city <WH5892> shall remain <WH3427> forever. <WH5769>

They shall come <WH935> from the cities <WH5892> of Judah, <WH3063> and from the places around <WH5439> Jerusalem, <WH3389> and from the land <WH776> of Benjamin, <WH1144> and from the lowland, <WH8219> and from the hill country, <WH2022> and from the South, <WH5045> bringing <WH935> burnt offerings, <WH5930> and sacrifices, <WH2077> and meal offerings, <WH4503> and frankincense, <WH3828> and bringing <WH935> sacrifices of thanksgiving, <WH8426> to the house <WH1004> of Yahweh. <WH3068>

But if you will not listen <WH8085> to me to make the Sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> holy, <WH6942> and not to bear <WH5375> a burden <WH4853> and enter in <WH935> at the gates <WH8179> of Jerusalem <WH3389> on the Sabbath <WH7676> day; <WH3117> then will I kindle <WH3341> a fire <WH784> in its gates, <WH8179> and it shall devour <WH398> the palaces <WH759> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and it shall not be quenched. <WH3518>
